{"id":545678024,"lang":"cpp","time":"12Â months","timestamp":1630171118,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"40 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/545678024/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers II","memory":"71.2 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* reverseLinkedList(ListNode* head){\n       ListNode* prev =NULL;\n       ListNode* cur = head;\n       ListNode* next ;\n       while(cur!=NULL){\n           next = cur->next ;\n           cur->next =prev;\n           prev=cur;\n           cur=next;\n       }\n        head = prev;\n        return head;\n    }\n    \n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n       l1=reverseLinkedList(l1);\n       l2=reverseLinkedList(l2);\n      \n       ListNode* cur;\n       int carry =0;\n        ListNode* head=NULL;\n       while(l1!=NULL || l2!=NULL){\n           int x1=  l1 !=NULL ? l1->val :0;\n           int x2=  l2 !=NULL ? l2->val: 0;\n           int sum = (carry+x1+x2)%10;\n           carry = (carry+x1+x2)/10;\n           \n           cur = new ListNode(sum);\n           cur->next = head ;\n           head = cur; \n           \n           l1 = l1!=NULL ? l1->next:NULL;\n           l2 = l2!=NULL ? l2->next:NULL;\n       } \n        if(carry!=0){\n            cur = new ListNode(carry);\n            cur->next=head;\n            head= cur;\n        }\n        \n        return head;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers-ii"}
